itunes:title: Episode 544 - DB Sports Companion Show 02/04/20 - The 50 Year Wait Is Over For The Chiefs!
title: Episode 544 - DB Sports Companion Show 02/04/20 - The 50 Year Wait Is Over For The Chiefs!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by special guest Benny "The Ticket Guru" Daniel to discuss the Chiefs first Super Bowl win in 50 years, how they won even though Patrick Mahomes played terrible, why Kyle Shanahan blew another lead in the 4th qu...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by special guest Benny "The Ticket Guru" Daniel to discuss the Chiefs first Super Bowl win in 50 years, how they won even though Patrick Mahomes played terrible, why Kyle Shanahan blew another lead in the 4th quarter of a Super Bowl, why Tom Brady is a perfect fit for the 49ers, why the Memphis Grizzlies want Andre Iguodala gone and how Ja Morant is a badass, why LeBron James has no heart, how the Big 10 might get in in 10 teams into March Madness, and why Mark Dantonio suddenly quit as the head coach for Michigan State football.
